snippet: Juan Diego Flórez sang a number and the audience loved it, so he sang it again.
abstract: Tenor Juan Diego Florez sings encore of aria in Metropolitan Opera production of Donizetti's Elisir d'Amore after audience responds to his original performance with a great deal of enthusiasm.

byline.original: By DANIEL J. WAKIN; Compiled by ADAM W. KEPLER

lead_paragraph: Juan Diego Flórez sang a number and the audience loved it, so he sang it again.

headline.main: Encore at the Met Pleases the Audience
headline.print_headline: Encore at the Met Pleases the Audience
